story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Iran, there lived a little princess named Leila. Leila was kind-hearted and brave, and she loved exploring the magical forests that surrounded her kingdom.

One day, a wise old owl appeared to Leila in a dream and told her about a mysterious treasure hidden deep within the enchanted forest. Excited by the idea of adventure, Leila set out on a journey to find the treasure, with the owl as her guide.

As they ventured deeper into the forest, Leila and the owl encountered many challenges and obstacles. They had to cross rushing rivers, climb steep mountains, and outsmart tricky forest creatures. But through it all, Leila's courage and determination never wavered.

Finally, after a long and arduous journey, Leila and the owl reached the heart of the forest, where they found a brilliant chest filled with shimmering jewels and precious gems. But more importantly, they discovered that the real treasure was the bond of friendship they had formed along the way.

Filled with joy and gratitude, Leila and the owl returned to the kingdom, where they shared their adventure with the king and queen. The entire kingdom celebrated their bravery and friendship, and Leila learned that the greatest treasures in life are not always the ones we can hold in our hands.

And so, as Leila drifted off to sleep that night, she knew that no matter where her adventures took her, she would always have the love and support of her friends and family to guide her along the way.

The end. Good night, sweet child. Dream of magical adventures and remember that the greatest treasures are found in the love and friendships we hold dear. Sleep well and may tomorrow bring you more wonderful dreams.
